description: Tracks code authored by Genesis agents via the Telegram-Claude bridge
convention: Human reviews all agent-generated code before merging to main

protection_tiers.1_core: Human-only. Boot, memory, interrupts, Agent trait, build config.
protection_tiers.2_guarded: Agent proposals require human review before merge.
protection_tiers.3_maintained: Agents modify with Thomas validation. Human spot-checks.
protection_tiers.4_playground: Full agent autonomy. Provenance tracked via this manifest.
protection_tiers.5_sandbox: Isolated. Secrets and credentials. No agent access.

lib/vision.py.author: genesis-claude
lib/vision.py.prompt: Build vision system for robot embodiment

lib/gemini_vision.py.author: genesis-claude
lib/gemini_vision.py.notes: Hardcoded API key removed by human reviewer

lib/robot_bridge.py.author: genesis-claude
lib/robot_bridge.py.prompt: Build robot bridge server/client for Genesis-to-hardware communication

tools/genesis_memory_persist.py.author: genesis-claude
tools/genesis_memory_persist.py.prompt: Build two-layer memory persistence (local disk + GitHub backup)

memory/.author: genesis-claude
memory/.prompt: Auto-generated memory checkpoints and state files
